Uses of Class
irtrusbot.IrcOrigin

    • Uses of IrcOrigin in irtrusbot

      Fields in irtrusbot declared as IrcOrigin 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      IrcOrigin IrcSession.account
      Origin information about the client/user of the session.
      IrcOrigin IrcMessage.from
      Origin object indicating information about the sender of the message.
      IrcOrigin IrcCommand.origin
      Origin information about the sender of a command/message - usually a user or the server
      Methods in irtrusbot with parameters of type IrcOrigin 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IrcMessage IrcMessage.getReply(IrcOrigin replyfrom, String replytext, boolean direct)
      Generates an IRC Message in the form of a reply to given message.
      void IrcSession.sendMessage(IrcOrigin from, String to, String text)
      Formats and sends a message (PRIVMSG) [based on message details] to the server
      Constructors in irtrusbot with parameters of type IrcOrigin 
      Constructor and Description
      IrcMessage(IrcOrigin ofrom, String sto, String stext)
      Creates an IRC message (PRIVMSG) object from details about a message received or to be sent.
